verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,
Speak unto Aaron , and say unto him, When thou lightest the lamps , the seven lamps shall give light over against the candlestick.
And Aaron did so; he lighted the lamps thereof over against the candlestick , as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* commanded Moses.

And this work of the candlestick \add was of\add* beaten gold , unto the shaft thereof, unto the flowers thereof, \add was\add* beaten work : according unto the pattern which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had shewed Moses , so he made the candlestick. \p
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,
Take the Levites from among the children of Israel , and cleanse them.

And thus shalt thou do unto them, to cleanse them: Sprinkle water of purifying upon them, and let them shave all their flesh , and let them wash their clothes , and \add so\add* make themselves clean.\f + \fr 8.7 \ft let them shave…: Heb. let them cause a razor to pass over, etc\f*
Then let them take a young bullock with his meat offering , \add even\add* fine flour mingled with oil , and another young bullock shalt thou take for a sin offering.
And thou shalt bring the Levites before the tabernacle of the congregation : and thou shalt gather the whole assembly of the children of Israel together :
And thou shalt bring the Levites before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and the children of Israel shall put their hands upon the Levites :

And Aaron shall offer the Levites before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add for\add* an offering of the children of Israel , that they may execute the service of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 8.11  t offer: Heb. wave *  +  r 8.11  t offering: Heb. wave offering *  +  r 8.11  t they…: Heb. they may be to execute, etc *

And the Levites shall lay their hands upon the heads of the bullocks : and thou shalt offer the one \add for\add* a sin offering , and the other \add for\add* a burnt offering , unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to make an atonement for the Levites.
And thou shalt set the Levites before Aaron , and before his sons , and offer them \add for\add* an offering unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
Thus shalt thou separate the Levites from among the children of Israel : and the Levites shall be mine.
And after that shall the Levites go in to do the service of the tabernacle of the congregation : and thou shalt cleanse them, and offer them \add for\add* an offering.

For they \add are\add* wholly given unto me from among the children of Israel ; instead of such as open every womb , \add even instead of\add* the firstborn of all the children of Israel , have I taken them unto me.
For all the firstborn of the children of Israel \add are\add* mine, \add both\add* man and beast : on the day that I smote every firstborn in the land of Egypt I sanctified them for myself.
And I have taken the Levites for all the firstborn of the children of Israel.

And I have given the Levites \add as\add* a gift to Aaron and to his sons from among the children of Israel , to do the service of the children of Israel in the tabernacle of the congregation , and to make an atonement for the children of Israel : that there be no plague among the children of Israel , when the children of Israel come nigh unto the sanctuary.\f + \fr 8.19 \ft a gift: Heb. given\f*

And Moses , and Aaron , and all the congregation of the children of Israel , did to the Levites according unto all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* commanded Moses concerning the Levites , so did the children of Israel unto them.

And the Levites were purified , and they washed their clothes ; and Aaron offered them \add as\add* an offering before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and Aaron made an atonement for them to cleanse them.

And after that went the Levites in to do their service in the tabernacle of the congregation before Aaron , and before his sons : as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had commanded Moses concerning the Levites , so did they unto them. \p
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,

This \add is it\add* that \add belongeth\add* unto the Levites : from twenty and five years old and upward they shall go in to wait upon the service of the tabernacle of the congregation :\f + \fr 8.24 \ft to…: Heb. to war the warfare of, etc\f*
And from the age of fifty years they shall cease waiting upon the service \add thereof\add*, and shall serve no more:\f + \fr 8.25 \ft cease…: Heb. return from the warfare of the service\f*
But shall minister with their brethren in the tabernacle of the congregation , to keep the charge , and shall do no service. Thus shalt thou do unto the Levites touching their charge.
